name: Scaventurez
description:
Scaventurez has been in development for three years. I wanted to create a serious RPG for mobile phones without the usual mobile game mechanics. There’s no P2W. No energy systems. No 50-click tutorials. There’s little hand holding. There is, indeed, my goal to make a game where players can engage in the creating process by giving feedback and making suggestions along the way.

Good luck and have fun!
